name: Inconspicuous Wizard’s Very Ordinary Adventure
description:
Download version 1.2, it was submitted just before the deadline.

A Game of dice and chance. You enter the tower of dice wizards, but will you be able to make it to the top? Or will you lose your dice and potentially much more in the process? (You only lose your dice).

Fight your opponents dice with your own by rolling, dealing damage and taking your opponents dice to grow your collection in this Pokemon inspired wizard battle game! Each coloured dice have special attributes when they roll high as well as dealing double damage to dice of advantageous colour matchups.

Try it out and let us know how you find it.
